Potato Soup!!

Ingredients:

  • 5 pound bag of potatos
  • 6 large onions
  • dozen eggs
  • 3/4 cup oil
  • 2 tspn salt

Steps:

  1. dice onions and saute them in the oil until browned
  2. fill pot with water
  3. dice potatos and add them into the pot of water
  4. boil the potatos until soft
  5. hard boil the eggs
  6. dice the eggs and add them to the pot
  7. add salt
  8. bring the pot to a boil and then let it simmer for at least 2 hours
  9. TASTE AND ENJOY!!!
